attributes.action: lobby public transport providers to make travel more affordable and plentiful
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the price of fuel rises to extortionate levels and the proposed inflation-busting increases to the price of road tax looms, we petition the Prime Minister to show his green credentials and incentify public transport providers to make travel more affordable and plentiful.
If commuters are to be forced off the roads, we have to have other affordable ways of getting to and from work.
